Name: GetLocalPlayer
Description: Returns the ULocalPlayer for this controller if it exists, or null otherwise

Name: GetHUD
Description: Gets the HUD currently being used by this player controller

Name: bShowMouseCursor
Description: Whether the mouse cursor should be displayed

Name: DefaultMouseCursor
Description: Type of mouse cursor to show by default

Name: SetupInputComponent
Description: Allows the PlayerController to set up custom input bindings.

Name: SetupInputComponent
Description: Allows the PlayerController to set up custom input bindings
